talked.text: Get lost. I have nothing to talk with you.

mean.text: What are you looking at? Say something or leave.

choices.text: I've been told about you and Alex pulling a prank on me.

warnNormal.text: Damn, you caught us. It was a silly thing.
But it's not funny anymore. We won't do it.

talked.text: I've already talked to Maria. I should look for people in the playground waiting for the bell to ring.

notMetChoices.text: To say hello. I always see you alone and reading.

niceResponse.text: People don't usually to talk to me.

ignore.text: If you don't mind... (She ignores you and keeps reading).

warn.text: I've heard Alex talking to Anna about pulling a prank on you.
I don't know what might be, but be careful. They aren't very funny to be precise.

notTalked.text: Have you seen that app that checks your relationship with the people you talk to the most?
It tells you who you get along with or not among all the people that also downloaded it.
It's said it is really accurate, but how it works isn't clear.
I see you already have it.
